question:
This question is a part of The 5 lb. Book of GRE Practice Problems (2nd Ed.) - VERBAL
The film was (i) _________ (ii) _________ by critics; rightfully, not a single reviewer had any positive thing to say about it.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) warily
(D) louded
(B) mendaciously
(E) panned
(C) roundly
(F) venerated
Kudos for the
right answer and solution
